hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: More than a pharmacy - we're your neighbors, committed to providing exceptional healthcare to our community since 2010.

story.title: Our Story
content: River Park Pharmacy was founded with a simple mission: to bring back the personal touch that modern pharmacy has lost. We believe that healthcare should be about relationships, not transactions.

Since opening our doors, we've served thousands of patients, becoming a trusted healthcare partner for families throughout our community. Our pharmacists know your name, your medications, and your health goals.

We're proud to be an independent pharmacy, which means we have the freedom to put patients first. No corporate mandates, no rushing through consultations - just genuine care from people who truly want to help you feel your best.

values.title: Compassionate Care
values.description: We treat every patient like family, taking the time to listen, understand, and provide personalized attention to your health needs.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We maintain the highest standards in pharmacy practice, continuously improving our services and staying current with the latest healthcare advances.

values.title: Community
values.description: We're deeply rooted in our community, supporting local initiatives and building lasting relationships with the families we serve.

values.title: Trust & Integrity
values.description: We operate with complete transparency and honesty, always putting your health and well-being above all else.
